document_data.name: Afghan
document_data.mainbody: '''Afghans''' were a type of knitwear found in the town of [[Dragon Falls (village)|Dragon Falls]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}},{{LCRB}} a group of goodly adventurers from the [[Living City]], [[Ravens Bluff]], visited the village of Dragon Falls on a quest to secure an evil [[artifact]], a ''[[Book of Vile Darkness]]''. While searching for any lore and history on the areas around the town, especially [[Keldar of the Forest]] and [[Keldar's Shrine]], adventurers visited an old cranky but knowledgeable crone. [[Kala (Dragon Falls)|Kala]] wore a warm knitted afghan during the meeting. She refused to take the throw off, whilst demanding the guests to fan her.
